QuestData.Title: Frosted Fury
QuestData.Description: The furies of Draenor are different than the elementals of Azeroth. But don't be fooled. Some be wicked, boss-mon. Wicked.$b$bThe trap we are making be needing some proper frostshards. You can get them, if ya willing, from the ice furies.$b$bDey be wandering the Cracking Plains, freezin' all dat dey touch, an' bein' wicked.$b$bBring us some o' these frostshards, boss-mon, an' we gonna whip ya up one deadly trap.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, now these be some fine trap making props. Ya know how to make a shadow huntah proud.
